400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The data you sent does not match the expected format

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You need to log in to access this page

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to access this page

404.title: Oops! Page not found
404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You have reached the request limit. Please wait a moment before trying again.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: Sorry, a server error occurred. Please try again later.
